name: Cape Trib Farmstay

reviews.title: Fruitilicious!
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here and were really impressed. The cabin was fairly basic but spotless and pleasant - surprisingly great shower. The owners are very friendly and the fruity breakfasts delicious and we certainly tried fruits we had never heard of let alone eaten before. It is centrally located. We loved nearby restaurant the Dragonfly - wonderful fresh food and friendly people and enjoyed our trip out to the reef on the Rum Runner.

aka: Cape Trib Farmstay Cape Tribulation, Daintree Region, Australia
description: Cape Trib Farmstay is cabins, bed & breakfast accommodation and tropical fruit orchards at Cape Tribulation in the Daintree, Far North Queensland, Australia. Close to beaches (5mins), restaurants and adventure activities, this is a natural retreat for eco travelers, bird watchers, animal/nature lovers and guests who seek a true Australian environment in which to relax.
